column2:
name
  1. a Ladin surname from a farm name (the most common in Gherdëina.

abbrev
  1. at or to the (+ feminine singular noun)

noun
  1. register office

verb
  1. (Badia, Val Gardena) Alternative form of avei

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) beard
  2. (Gherdëina) uncle
  3. mister (title of adult male)
  4. man (adult male)
  5. gentleman (well-mannered man)

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) cloth, polishing cloth, cleaning cloth, rag, cleaning rag

noun
  1. (Gherdëina, esp. Urtijëi) sweet (UK), candy (US)
  2. (Gherdëina, esp. Sëlva, S. Crestina) penis

adv
  1. (Gherdëina) hither, to this place, to here, to me/us

adv
  1. (colloquial, Gherdëina) right?; is it?; is it not?

noun
  1. (Val di Fassa, law) subsection
  2. (Val di Fassa, orthography) comma

noun
  1. (Val di Fassa) calculation; computation
  2. (Val di Fassa) counting
  3. (Val di Fassa) count (male ruler of a county)

noun
  1. (Gherdëina, vulgar slang) ass, bottom, buttocks, butt

abbrev
  1. from or of the (+ masculine plural noun)

noun
  1. discussion (of an argument or theme)
  2. carrying out (of a programme of work)

abbrev
  1. of the, from the (+ a masculine noun in singular)

abbrev
  1. of the, from the (+ a feminine noun in singular)

adv
  1. (badiot) long (having a duration in time), for a long time
  2. (badiot) in a long time

verb
  1. To give off, send out; emanate, radiate
  2. To promulgate

verb
  1. (Gherdëina) to receive, to get, to obtain

adv
  1. (Gherdëina) long (having a duration in time), for a long time
  2. (Gherdëina) in a long time

intj
  1. (Gherdëina) A greeting acknowledging someone’s arrival or presence, comparable to English hey, hi

article
  1. (before a vowel) Apocopic form of la: the

adj
  1. Ladin (related to the people or language of Alpine Italy)

verb
  1. (transitive) to leave (something behind); to let (something happen) or allow (something to happen)

noun
  1. Distance between things.
  2. Physical extent across two or three dimensions.

adj
  1. (Gherdëina) light (in weight)
  2. (Gherdëina) light (of diet, low in calories)

verb
  1. To change, modify, mutate
  2. To commute
  3. To substitute
  4. To modify
  5. To exchange

adv
  1. (Gherdëina) at that time (in the past); at the time, then

verb
  1. (Gherdëina) to overtake; to pass (e.g. a vehicle, a runner)

adj
  1. (Gherdëina) heavy (in weight)
  2. (Gherdëina) heavy (of diet, high in calories)

verb
  1. can, could; be able to
  2. may, might; be possible to

adj
  1. Of or pertaining to the legal process

verb
  1. (Gherdëina, transitive) to clean
  2. (Gherdëina, transitive) to polish

verb
  1. To result (turn out to be)
  2. To appear, seem

verb
  1. To know (information)
  2. To know how to; can
  3. To taste

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) broom (usually a smaller one only used indoors)

pron
  1. (indefinite) one, you, we, they, people. Note: often translated using the passive voice in English.
  2. (reflexive) oneself, himself, herself, itself, themselves; (reciprocal) each other, one another. Note: With some verbs, si is not translated in English.

verb
  1. To assure, guarantee
  2. To ensure, insure, assure
  3. To secure

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) door handle
  2. (Gherdëina, colloquially, slang) sexually attractive woman

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) eaves (The underside of a roof that extends beyond the external walls of a building.)

noun
  1. (Mareo, Badia, Fascia, Anpezo, Fodom) earth; ground; soil

noun
  1. (gherdëina, badiot) animal
  2. A person who has a quality thought of as animalistic, such as ferocity, strength, hairiness, etc.

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) earth, soil, ground, world
  2. (Fodom) Alternative form of tera

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) ring (round piece of metal worn around the finger)

verb
  1. (auxiliary, followed by a past participle) forms the passive voice

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) Quitting time, hometime; the workday's end and the evening following it, used for relaxation or leisure.

character
  1. The open-mid central unrounded vowel as used in the Gherdëina variant of Ladin.

character
  1. The open-mid central unrounded vowel as used in the Gherdëina variant of Ladin.

noun
  1. (Gherdëina) hour
  2. (Gherdëina) time (of the day); hour
